name: ci
description: Reduced deterministic benchmark profile for PR regression gating.

explicitExclusions.terminal-screen-transition: Excluded from PR gate due higher route-mode variance; covered in manual/nightly PTY runs.
explicitExclusions.terminal-fps-stream: Excluded from PR gate due host-dependent scheduler noise in high-frequency stream workloads.
explicitExclusions.terminal-input-latency: Excluded from PR gate due event-loop scheduling sensitivity across CI hosts.
explicitExclusions.terminal-memory-soak: Excluded from PR gate to keep PR runtime bounded; tracked in dedicated profiling runs.
explicitExclusions.terminal-full-ui-navigation: Excluded to keep PR perf runtime bounded; full-ui navigation is tracked outside the reduced gate.
explicitExclusions.terminal-strict-ui-navigation: Excluded to keep PR perf runtime bounded; strict navigation parity is tracked outside the reduced gate.
